definition: possessing or existing in bodily form, a noncommissioned officer in the Army or Air Force or Marines
details:
adjective
- possessing or existing in bodily form
= example: possessing or existing in bodily form
= synonyms: bodied
- affecting or characteristic of the body as opposed to the mind or spirit
= synonyms: bodily
noun
- a noncommissioned officer in the Army or Air Force or Marines
